content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Right now it is assumed that the final maturita exams will go forward as usual with the in-person presence of the students at the exam. No adjustments to the form of the final exam are known at this time.

This could change, based on the development of the epidemiological situation. Any changes or new information will be updated on this website. It is also important to monitor the latest information from your school.

At the present time, students are preparing for their exams through distance education, since in-person education is not allowed.

You can check some useful tips online.Â You can also look at exams from past years.

If you need psychological assistance or help handling stress look in the Stress and handling the impacts of the pandemic section.
